CustomField.formula: If(or(Account_Reassignment_Stage__c = "Current Rep - 90 Day Observation",Account_Reassignment_Stage__c="New Rep - In 180-Day Review"),"Yes","No")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Account Reassignment flag. Yes if the Account Reassignment Stage is either "Current Rep in 90 Day Observation" or "New Rep in 180 Day Observation").
CustomField.label: Account Reassignment Yes/No
